articles.author: Samia Nakhoul, Jonathan Saul
articles.description: A careful campaign of deception ensured Israel was caught off guard when the Palestinian Islamist group Hamas launched its devastating attack, enabling a force using bulldozers, hang gliders and motorbikes to take on the Middle East's most powerful army.
articles.title: How Israel was duped as Hamas planned devastating assault

articles.author: Andrew Gray, Sarah Marsh
articles.description: The European Commission said on Monday it was putting all of its development aid for Palestinians, worth 691 million euros ($729 million), under review and immediately suspending all payments following Hamas' attack on Israel.
articles.title: EU freezes development aid to Palestinians after Hamas attack

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Israel's response to the unprecedented multi-pronged attack by Palestinian gunmen from the Gaza Strip will "change the Middle East," Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Monday.
articles.title: Netanyahu says Israel's response to Gaza attack will "change the Middle East"

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Global companies have temporarily shut some operations in Israel and have asked employees to work from home following a devastating weekend attack by Palestinian Islamist group Hamas.
articles.title: What are global firms with presence in Israel doing after Hamas attack

articles.author: Andrew Mills, Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Qatari mediators have held urgent calls to try to negotiate freedom for Israeli women and children seized by the militant group and held in Gaza in exchange for the release of 36 Palestinian women and children from Israel's prisons, a source briefed on the talks told Reuters.
articles.title: Qatar in talks with Hamas, Israel to swap hostages for prisoners

articles.author: Phil Stewart, Kanishka Singh
articles.description: The U.S. military is "surging" fresh supplies of air defenses, munitions and other security assistance to Israel to help it respond to an unprecedented weekend attack by Hamas, a senior U.S. defense official said on Monday.
articles.title: U.S. rushing air defenses, munitions to Israel, defense official says

articles.author: Dedi Hayun
articles.description: Hundreds of cars abandoned in the scramble to flee a massacre at an Israeli music festival where Hamas gunmen killed 260 people and took captives back into Gaza underline the scale of the deadliest attack on Israel in decades.
articles.title: Abandoned cars underline panic at Israeli music festival where Hamas gunmen killed hundreds

articles.author: Emily Rose, Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: The Islamist militant Hamas movement threatened to execute an Israeli captive every time Israel bombs a Palestinian home without warning, as Israel called up an unprecedented 300,000 reservists and imposed a blockade on the Gaza Strip, raising fears it planned a ground assault.
articles.title: Hamas threatens to kill captives if Israel strikes civilians

articles.author: Steve Holland, Matt Spetalnick
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, uncomfortable allies in the best of times, will put their uneasy relationship to a further test with Israel preparing a possible ground assault on the Palestinian Gaza Strip.
articles.title: Analysis: Israel-Hamas war forces Biden and Netanyahu into uneasy partnership

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Many people have been killed in an artillery strike at a camp for internally displaced people in Myanmar's Kachin State, among them women, children and the elderly, local media, an activist and sources in the area said on Tuesday.
articles.title: Many killed in artillery strike in northern Myanmar - media, local sources
